features.name: Aim for the Eyes
features.description: When you hit a target with an attack and the target moved a net distance of 10 ft. or less during it's last turn, you also Blind them until the start of your next turn.

features.name: Acid Spittle
features.description: Ranged: +6 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 6 acid damage.
